title: Sidewall, 1945–48
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Scenic vignette with five putti or small boys, next to a large arched column. Large-scale flowering vine with roses and carnations rises up from center of vignette. A rooster is perched on top. Printed in pink, white, blue, green and taupe on light blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1945–48.
1945–48. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-13.
